docs.lead_paragraph: As a defensive weapon the value of the machete is small. Even its offensive effect depends less on the weapon itself than on the continual and skillful usage made of it by the Cuban peasant from his earlier age, which imparts a peculiar training to the muscles of the wrist and arm of the operator.

headline.main: CURRENT LITERATURE; Selected Extracts in Prose and Verse from Periodicals.
